EmailTemplate.subject: Participate in the RE-CRAFTED programm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
I am happy to introduce you to our new RIMOWA RE-CRAFTED program.
From now on, no matter its age or condition, your pre-loved RIMOWA aluminium suitcase can be recycled or refurbished as part of RIMOWA RE-CRAFTED.
With focus on reusing, repairing, and recycling suitcases, your participation in the RE-CRAFTED program helps build a more sustainable world.
I'd be pleased to share more about this exciting program with you.
Best,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
